Reviews.Title: No HDMI Port
Reviews.Author: Isaac Ashun
Reviews.Content: Was advertised as having an HDMI port for connecting to HD TV sets but it doesn't. Good battery life though.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Davona L Parisher
Reviews.Content: My son switched from a  laptop to this table with wireless keyboard and loves it for college!! I was a great investment.

Reviews.Title: Missing Adaptor
Reviews.Author: Cherrie May
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great however when it was delivered it was missing the power adaptor.  I have tried to contact Amazon and Dell and each says its the others problem.  So, I have a Tablet that I cannot use because I dont have a power adaptor and neither company will provide me with one.  Yes, I can purchase one but since I spent over 600 dollars on this Tablet it should have been in my order to begin with!

Reviews.Title: Nightmare
Reviews.Author: ar10
Reviews.Content: Arrived intact. Missing windows 8 product key. Dell customer support told me to call Microsoft. Useless product no customer help. They have hung up on me twice and have called me a liar, they asked me if I lived in Brazil. No wonder Dell are going belly up. No mini hdmi out. Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Limited but ok
Reviews.Author: ce33
Reviews.Content: Most tablets are very limited to what they can do therefore that's why I give this tablet 4 stars. You do not buy a tablet because you want the power and ports that a laptop has... You give up size and weight for a comfortable compact screen... To expect a lot of ports and speed is like expecting a motorcycle to have the same luxury and speed as a car.Good product , for what it is a "tablet". A better docking system maybe in order but so far okMaybe the problem the past reviews have is the seller ... Not dell... I have had nothing but incomparable customer support from dell when I purchased directly from them.
